author: Jeremy Deckard
title: Rural dominates Highland Park 55-0
text:
Rural dominates Highland Park 55-0 Junior Blues hold Scots to negative rushing yards Posted: October 9, 2015 - 10:07pm By Jeremy Deckard The Capital-Journal 
Like a prizewinning thoroughbred, the Washburn Rural Junior Blues were quick out of the starting gate Friday and finished strong in a 55-0 Centennial League victory over Highland Park. 
The Junior Blues (5-1 overall, 5-1 in league) drove the ball 72 yards in nine plays to open the game. Quarterback Mitchell Schurig connected with Braeden Ingold on a 13-yard touchdown through the air. It was the first pass attempt for Washburn Rural after starting the game with eight straight running plays. 
After forcing the Scots (0-6, 0-5) to punt on their first possession, the Junior Blues scored on their second drive with Hunter Browning capping a 49-yard drive with a an 8-yard touchdown run, his first of three on the night. 
Linebacker Will Jones opened the second quarter scoring by recovering a fumble and returning it 17 yards for a touchdown. The Washburn Rural defensive unit forced four turnovers and held the Scots to negative rushing yards. 
“We’ve kind of depended on the defense all year,” Junior Blues coach Steve Buhler said. “They played well tonight. The defense has been consistent and gives us a chance in every ball game.” 
Browning led the offense in the second half scoring two touchdowns in the third quarter. The junior running back finished with a game high 87 yards rushing on seven carries. 
“He (Browning) played really well,” Buhler said. “He sets the tone for us by just how physical he plays. He gives everyone a ‘pick-me-up’ when he need one and he did a nice job running the ball in the third quarter.” 
Schurig finished the game with 123 yards passing on 10 completions, throwing for two scores. 
Washburn Rural (5-1, 5-1) 14 7 20 14 – 55 
Highland Park (0-6, 0-5) 0 0 0 0 – 0 
Washburn Rural — Ingold 13 pass from Schurig (Kayser kick) 
Washburn Rural — Browning 8 run (Kayser kick) 
Washburn Rural — Jones 17 fumble return (Kayser kick) 
Washburn Rural — Browning 26 run (Kayser kick) 
Washburn Rural — Browning 32 run (kick failed) 
Washburn Rural — Redd 10 run (Kayser kick) 
Washburn Rural — Martens 27 pass from Schurig (Kayser kick) 
Washburn Rural — Scott 11 run (Kayser kick)
